Activity: Review the documentation and notes from yesterday's tool evaluation. Finalize and send the email to @beng-1 and @tart-1 regarding build automation and asset management.
Focus on the tool identified as the most promising on Monday. Begin a deeper dive into its features and functionalities. Look for advanced configuration options and integration possibilities.

Attempt to integrate the selected tool into a more complex test project that closely resembles the actual game development environment. This will help identify any potential performance bottlenecks or compatibility issues.
Lunch break. Read technical articles on software architecture and game development best practices.
Continue working on the integration of the tool into the test project. Troubleshoot any errors or issues that arise. Consult online forums and documentation for solutions.

Create a detailed report on the integration process, including any challenges faced and solutions implemented. Document the tool's performance characteristics and its impact on the development workflow.

Review the progress made on the tool integration. Identify any remaining tasks or areas that require further attention. Prepare for a possible meeting with @lpro-1 to discuss the findings and next steps.
